data.text:
2021 Cal Poly Pomona Women's Soccer Roster

Choose a Player:

0 Clarissa Sanchez

Position Goalkeeper

Height 5-5

Class Senior

Hometown Fairfield, Calif.

High School Vanden HS

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

COLLEGIATE AWARDS AND HONORS (Entering 2021):

CCAA All-Academic (2018-19, 2019-20)

CCAA Fall All-Academic (2019)

2019 (JUNIOR): Appeared in four games, all CPP wins, and drew two starts ... Allowed two goals over 238:48 for .753 GAA ... Made six saves with .750 save percentage ... Finished 2-0 with one shutout ... Season debut as starter vs. MSU Denver (9/15), earning first collegiate individual clean sheet and win while playing all 99:52 and making four stops in 1-0 overtime triumph ... Stopped two shots over full 90 minutes in 3-2 victory vs. Northwest Nazarene (9/19) in next match in San Diego ... Played 28:30 and 20:26, respectively, in combined shutouts and wins vs. San Francisco State (10/27) and Cal State East Bay (11/1) ... Faced 18 shots.

2018 (SOPHOMORE): Appeared in six games, drawing three starts ... Allowed seven goals over 392:55 for 1.603 GAA ... Made seven saves with .500 save percentage ... Made college debut as starter in opener at Seattle Pacific (8/31), playing entire first half ... Played second half of CCAA opener at Cal State San Bernardino (9/19), earning credit for first college save ... Played final 57:55 vs. Chico State (9/30) ... Played all 90 minutes of starts at No. 23 Sonoma State (10/5) and at Humboldt State (10/7), with season-high four saves in latter ... Final appearance in finale at Cal State Dominguez Hills (10/27), playing last 65 minutes and combining on shutout in scoreless draw ... Faced 32 shots.

2017 (FRESHMAN): Did not appear in a game for the Broncos as one of three goalkeepers on roster.

HIGH SCHOOL: A 2017 graduate of Vanden High School in Fairfield ... All-league, Most Valuable Player and All-City Player of the Year as a senior ... All-league and Most Valuable Defender as a junior ... Scholar-Athlete award as both a junior and senior.

PERSONAL: A Business major ... Born Sept. 12 in Fairfield ... Daughter of parents Gustavo and Sylvia ... Has two siblings, Gisselle and Gustavo, Jr. ... Career aspirations include working at a large technology-based corporation such as Amazon or a social media platform ... Enjoys traveling ... Roots for Real Madrid ... Favorite athlete is Mexico and Club Am√©rica goalkeeper Guillermo Ochoa ... Favorite TV show is How I Met Your Father ... Top movie is The Best of Me ... Loves Thai food ... Has 38 first cousins.
